|802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = SquareOne |defaultssid_regex = ^SquareOne$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/09/2006 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Billionton GMIWLGRL2 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2561;RT2561T; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2527;RT2527L; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per the manual, the default SSID is '''SquareOne'''. :Per WiGLE, the probable OUI is 00:10:60. ==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/itian/square_one_sq201 ''Itian SquareOne SQ201'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] â€¢ [http://www.df.lth.se/~triad/krad/itian-squareone/ FW] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=78686 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (high-res internal shot) :Integrated 3.5" HDD inside the box, external eSATA port, :3x usb ports, 4-port 1GbE switch, int. WiFi miniPCI card 
1. VIA Vectro VT6212L 4-port USB 2.0 host controller 
2. Storlink SL3516 ARM SoC (Cortina SL3516)
3. Marvell 88E1111-BAB1 10/100/1000 Ultra GbE Transceiver 
4. Vitesse VSC7395XYV Enhanced 5+1-Port Integrated GbE Switch
5. Jmicron JM20339 Hi-Speed USB to SATA Bridge (ext/int eSATA)
6. Ralink RT2561 based WiFi miniPCI Card (U.FL connectors)
7. Spansion (AMD) 16MB Flash Memory
8. Nanya DDR2 128MB RAM in two chips
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/itian/itian_square_one_sq201 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/itian/square_one_sq201 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = gemini |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_fa526 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.5 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
